source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as RecordCount from saleslt.product
select count(*) as Record_Count from saleslt.customer

activities.name: Get the High Water MArk Date
Get the Record date from DB

dependsOn.activity: Get the High Water MArk Date

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(modifieddate) as RecordDate from saleslt.customer

dependsOn.activity: Get the Record date from DB

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > ''', activity('Get the High Water MArk Date').output.firstRow.new_date,''' and modifieddate <= ''',activity('Get the Record date from DB').output.firstRow.RecordDate, '''')
@concat('select''',activity('Get the Record date from DB').output.firstRow.RecordDate, ''' as new_date from saleslt.customer where customerid=1')
